rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a foyer leading to the main living area. Features a reception desk and seating for guests.
Modern open-plan living room with large windows to maximize natural light as per Vastu guidelines. It overlooks the garden and serves as a central hub.
A contemporary kitchen with an island counter, designed for efficient workflow, adhering to Vastu principles by placing it in the east direction.
An adjacent dining area integrated with the living room, offering ample seating and a view of the garden.
A dedicated home theater space with soundproofing, designed in accordance with Vastu principles to ensure calm energy flow. It is strategically placed away from the entrance.
A guest bedroom providing privacy and comfort, ensuring a harmonious Vastu alignment with good energy flow.

openings.description: A double entry door placed in the north for positive energy, following Vastu guidelines. Equipped with modern security features.
Secondary exit leading to the garden area and providing additional ventilation, in line with sustainable design principles.

garden_area.description: A large landscaped garden designed to enhance natural energy flow. Features include greenery, water elements, and seating areas in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Placed in the west for privacy and relaxation as per Vastu principles.
A dedicated study space designed for productivity with ample natural light, positioned to receive beneficial energy flows according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Balconies adjoining the master bedroom and study, providing an outdoor feel and fresh air circulation.

features.description: Expansive landscaped garden promoting a connection with nature.
Dedicated home theater space designed for high-quality audio and visual experiences.
